name: Quod Tam Cito Jerboa
description:
Team Name: 

AAAA Games

Team members: 

Alex Lipatov - Programming - lipneteng91@yandex.ru

Anastasia Utina - Art - ustya@live.com

Alexander Eremin - Game Design - eremin1852@gmail.com

Artyom Dronik - UI Design - kinordm@yandex.ru

Game name: 

Quod Tam Cito Jerboa

Name of your submission: 

We just really want t-shirts Unreal Engine 2018 Summer Game Jam

List any content that was created before the jam:

We used freemusicarchive.org and soundly for music and sounds

Input Keys:

AD keys:

Moving to right and left

Space key:

-if on ground - jump

-if near to wall - jump from wall(be careful you need use a or d key depending on the side where you want to jump)

-if in the air - hover moving

F key:

Attack

F7 key:

The most favorite button, restart by last save place.

p.s. the game may seem difficult, but it is passable, enjoy;)
